body_html: We're adding listener argument to tf.estimator.Estimator.train since there are edge cases related to creation of CheckpointSaverHook. User can create his/her own CheckpointSaverHook before calling MonitoredTrainingSession. It's also not a common thing. So I recommend not to change MonitoredTrainingSession.
body_text: We're adding listener argument to tf.estimator.Estimator.train since there are edge cases related to creation of CheckpointSaverHook.  User can create his/her own CheckpointSaverHook before calling MonitoredTrainingSession. It's also not a common thing. So I recommend not to change MonitoredTrainingSession.
body: We're adding listener argument to `tf.estimator.Estimator.train` since there are edge cases related to creation of `CheckpointSaverHook`.  User can create his/her own `CheckpointSaverHook` before calling `MonitoredTrainingSession`. It's also not a common thing. So I recommend not to change `MonitoredTrainingSession`.
